title: Taxpayer Empowerment Act
content: Taxpayer Empowerment Act - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to allow an eligible individual to file a taxpayer empowerment form by April 15 of each year that specifies the individual's allocation of budget authority for major outlay categories. Requires the Secretary of the Treasury to compile such budgeting decisions and report to the House and Senate Budget Committees and the Director of the Office of Management and Budget. Requires the President's budget and the congressional budget to reflect such taxpayer allocations.
